title: A-Z Databases
cleaned_text: Provides discoverability and facilitates access to geospatial resources. The resources in the portal are selected and curated by librarians and geospatial specialists at twelve research institutions in the [Big Ten Academic Alliance.](https://www.btaa.org/) The resources include GIS datasets, web services, and digitized historical maps. Learn more about the research institutions involved and the sources of the geospatial records. [Learn more](https://sites.google.com/umn.edu/btaa-gdp/about) about the research institutions involved and the sources of the geospatial records.
